mapper.select: select count(*) from itemtab where itemname=#{itemName} and classification=#{classification}
select classification, itemimagepath, itemname from itemtab where itemname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select classification, itemimagepath, itemname from itemtab where classification LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select itemnum, classification, itemimagepath, itemname from itemtab
select classification, itemimagepath, itemname from itemtab where classification = #{classification} and itemname = #{itemName}
mapper.delete: delete from itemtab where itemname=#{itemName} and classification = #{classification}
